name: Glow & Lovely Advanced Multi Vitamin Cream
description:
Glow & Lovely Advanced Multi Vitamin Cream (formerly known as Fair & Lovely) works like a skin expert to give you a radiant glow which is skin clarity, brightness, and Radiance. Enriched with Vitamin B3, C, and E, this cream gets quickly absorbed and penetrates deep* into the skin, to brighten skin cells, reduce spots, and illuminate skin from the inside out. Vitamin B3 also known as Niacimide is known to improve the skin barrier, act as an anti-inflammatory, protect the skin’s natural health, and give a glow. Vitamin C is known to protect the skin from external damage and is known to improve skin immunity and reduce spots. Vitamin E is known to moisturize your skin from deep within keeping it hydrated. Allantoin helps remove dull skin cells from the top layers of the skin revealing soft smooth glowing skin. Also has antioxidants that help reduce dark circles. This formulation is clinically proven to give an even-toned; glowing skin which is nonoily. It has UVA & UVB sunscreens known to protect the skin by blocking UV rays. The product has no bleaching agents and is dermatologically tested and proven. Just dot over the face and massage evenly over the face and neck. Use twice daily for best results after cleansing the skin. *Within Epidermis

name: Glo-On Pink Glow Skin Cream
description:
Introducing the all new GLO-ON PINK GLOW CREAM, with American Skin Technology, Vitamin B3, B5, C, E and 2 Glow Molecules (Glow Booster and Pep Complex) to give you back your labonnomoi pink glow. Glo-On is a skin brightening cream which gives you spot-less skin and long-lasting glow.    6-Way Action:  Vitamin C: For Dark Spot Reduction | Vitamin E: For UV Damage Protection | Vita B3-Pep Complex: For Enhanced Skin Glow | Glow Booster: Long Lasting Glow | Sunscreen: For Sun Protection | Oil Absorber: For Oil-Free Look    Key ingredients:  Aqua, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Extract, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract; Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Vitamin E acetate, Sodium ascorbyl phosphate (Vitamin C); Titanium dioxide, Aluminium starch octenylsuccinate, Ethylhexylmethoxycinnamate, Butylmethoxydibenzoylmethane; Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, C.I. 16255. description:

Its gentle formula ensures that your skin receives pure, natural care without any potentially damaging ingredients.
